title: Trump is threatening to take over the Panama Canal, which Panama owns outright
description: President-elect Donald Trump says he wants ships to pay less to move through the Panama Canal, and he said he would demand control over the canal if he doesn’t get what he wants.
author: María Luisa Paúl
excerpt: President-elect Donald Trump says he wants ships to pay less to move through the Panama Canal, and he said he would demand control over the canal if he doesn’t get what he wants.
text: President-elect Donald Trump on Sunday floated the idea of taking over the Panama Canal — a vital maritime route for global trade that was once under American control. At a rally in Arizona, Trump criticized fees to use the vital Latin American shipping lane, a day after complaining on social media that the United States “foolishly gave it away” during the Carter administration and that China has expanded its influence on the canal.
html: President-elect Donald Trump on Sunday floated the idea of taking over the Panama Canal — a vital maritime route for global trade that was once under American control. At a rally in Arizona, Trump criticized fees to use the vital Latin American shipping lane, a day after complaining on social media that the United States “foolishly gave it away” during the Carter administration and that China has expanded its influence on the canal.
